node.title: Defence backflips to produce evidence of seaman's bullying before suicide
node.alt: Teri Bailey smiling in her uniform.
node.description: Defence backflipped on being able to find documents relating to the bullying of a suicidal young seaman only after the royal commission into veteranÂ suicide began, the seaman's sister reveals.
node.content:
["Defence backflipped on being able to find documents relating to the bullying of a suicidal young seaman only after the Royal Commission into Defence and Veteran Suicide began, the seaman's sister has revealed.", "Alexandra Bailey detailed to the commission\u00a0the chain of events including bullying in the Navy that led to her sister Teri Bailey's suicide last year.", "Ms Bailey told how after her sister, a young naval recruit, dislocated her knee on a ship she\u00a0was called a \"sea dodger\" and would get kicked in the back of the joint while marching and was\u00a0pinched and had\u00a0her hair pulled.", "When her sister complained about the bullying Ms Bailey said she\u00a0was told: \"Shut the f..k up, get out of my office or I'll break your other leg and throw you overboard'.\"", "Ms Bailey said the abuse, which included a sexual assault in a psychiatric ward, had led to her sister's decline in mental health and eventual suicide.", "Ms Bailey said she and her father had asked the Inspector General of the Australian Defence Force (IGADF) conduct an inquiry into her sister's case.", "But she said they were told there was no evidence of her sister complaining.", "", "
Teri's sister Alexandra and father Alan Bailey gave evidence today to the Royal Commission into Defence and Veteran Suicide.(ABC News: Lexy Hamilton-Smith)
", "Then the royal commission started and there were documents found, she said.", "\"Initially, we received an email quite quickly stating they were unable to find any evidence that Teri ever made any reports,'' she said.", "Ms Bailey said the IGADF inquiry is ongoing.", "
Little support offered after suicide
", "Ms Bailey also expressed her concern about the ADF's recruiting process, describing it as a form of grooming.", "\"My sister was a very young woman. She, from what I believe, has been misled about the career choice she had made,'' said Ms Bailey.", "She also revealed that the family had no contact with Defence after her sister's suicide until her father reached out to the Department of Veterans' Affairs.", "", "
Teri Bailey sister told the royal commission she had been \"misled about the career choice she had made\".(Supplied: Royal Commission into Defence and Veteran Suicide)
", "Another issue raised was the response by the ADF to Teri's death.", "Ms Bailey said a bereavement officer reached out to her father to \"offer him a commemorative pin for her sister's service\".", "Commission chair Nick Kaldas thanked Ms Bailey for giving evidence saying it was \"a brave thing for you to do\" and it had been \"enormously helpful\".", "The commission's hearings continues."]
